triples.name: Sentiment analysis
triples.relevance: The paper applies sentiment analysis techniques to Twitter data to extract mood information from public discourse.

triples.name: Twitter
triples.relevance: Twitter is the primary data source from which all tweets analyzed in the study were collected.

triples.name: Psychometrics
triples.relevance: The paper employs psychometric instruments to measure and extract six mood dimensions from aggregated Twitter content.

triples.name: Mood (psychology)
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel six-dimensional framework for measuring and modeling public mood using sentiment data.

triples.name: Microblogging
triples.relevance: Twitter is characterized as a microblogging platform where users share short posts that form the basis of the mood analysis.

triples.name: Economic indicator
triples.relevance: The paper aims to demonstrate the connection between public mood metrics and existing economic indicators for predictive modeling.
